data.value: You are not authorized to use Twitch.

data.value: Password or stream key is not valid or server may be down. Please try to re-enter your credentials.

data.name: StreamChannelIsEmpty
data.value: Your channel is not yet available, or access code protected. Please ensure that you have entered your credentials correctly, your channel does not have access code and that you have configured your channel properly in the {0} website.

data.value: Recommended resolutions for streaming on Twitch is from {0} to {1}. Your {3} may not be sufficient to stream {2}. Your recommended settings are:

data.value: Unavailable or, access code protected. Use stream key instead.

data.name: InvalidChannelCredentials
data.value: A problem occured while authenticating your credentials. Please check that your username and password are correct, your channel is not access code protected, and your connection to Twitch is okay.

data.name: InvalidChannelCredentials2
data.value: A problem occured while authenticating your account. Please check that your account is properly authorized and your connection to Twitch is okay.

data.name: UsernameIsUnknown
data.value: Your channel is not yet available, or access code protected. Please ensure that you have entered your credentials correctly, your channel does not have access code and that you have configured your channel properly in the Twitch website.

data.value: I no longer want to be linked to Twitch.
